column4: i'm trying to set up a 3g usb modem on hardy... i can't figure it out...
what modem is it?
huawei e220
okay, the easiest way to get that setup is install the new network manager which comes by default in intrepid
you can also add the network manager ppa
thanks googling now
https://launchpad.net/~network-manager/+archive
thanks upgrading and rebooting
it reconizes the card all well but i can't get it to connect
make sure you have the right settings
i'm unsure what are the right settings... i don't even know what to google to find out... :-[
can you point me in the right direction... like what to google?
sorry was away, am really not sure. Best thing to do is ask your service provider or google your service providers name and linux
maybe if i knew what i was looking for exactly.. like the login name? vpn?
you are right clicking and going to edit connections > mobile broadband right?
yeah it reconizes everythign.. it just doesn't connect... no errors no nothing.. just doesn't work
err did you make sure your username and password was correct, for that matter all the settings were correct when right clicking?
honestly i don't know where to find that.. and i'm weary of calling att since they think i have a prepaid phone... heh.
well if you have att they're a pretty big telco, do you want me to try google around for you?
if i knew what to google i'd do it.. i just don't know what to google...
you might want to ask in #ubuntu-us or #ubuntu-us-<yourstate> as they will most likely know what settings are needed by the local telco
i went there first they tend to not respond... but i
sorry thats all I've got
no don
